2SFVSC.name: 2SFVSC
2SFVSC.description: A Production Planning model considering uncertain demand using two stage stochastic programming in a fresh vegetable supply chain context.

stochastic.name: 2SDASC
stochastic.description: A two stage model to help the optimal purchase and storage policies for seasonal fruits.

deterministic.name: DASC
deterministic.description: A deterministic model to help the optimal purchase and storage policies for seasonal fruits

deterministic.name: ODFP
deterministic.description: A deterministic model to tackle the optimal delivery of fattened pigs to the abattoir

multistage.name: MSODFP
multistage.description: A multi - stage stochastic model to tackle the optimal delivery of fattened pigs to the abattoir

multihorizon.name: ODFP
multihorizon.description: A multi - horizon stochastic model to tackle the optimal delivery of fattened pigs to the abattoir

Chiara.name: Chiara Model
Chiara.description: A multi - horizon stochastic model to electricity fileds.

deterministic.name: SAM
deterministic.description: A deterministic model to solve the microgrid problem.

game theory.name: SAMGT
game theory.description: A non - linear model to solve the equilibrium problems in microgrids.

GP.name: Green Police
GP.description: A non linear model to assing task ensuring SLA.
